title: Why fill times so long? Defeats the purpose?
body: I'm fine with playing support that's why I fill. But you tell me my estimated wait time is 1:35 and I end up waiting 10 minutes to get filled as support. It doesn't seem like there is any point in filling now if it takes just as long?

replies.body: wtf how did you wait 10 minutes for a game at all?  Even if you go intensive roles like mid or jungle I've never waited that long for a single que pop.
All my fill times have been at least 5 minutes. It's so ridiculous.
